Name: Candace
Title: Golden Vow: Candace
Desc: The crimson sand flows, an oath to defend.
Source: Reward for inviting Candace to a duel at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with her

12072.Name: Sacred Rite: Heron's Sanctum
12072.Desc: Attaches a <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C112071]</color> to this character and $[K53|s1] <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S12074]</color>.

C112071.Name: Heron Shield
C112071.Desc: While preparing this Skill: Grant 2 $[K6] points to the character to which this is attached.

K6.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#4007}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Shield</color>
K6.Desc: This Shield will be consumed to protect the character who equips it from DMG.

K53.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Prepare Skill</color>|s1:<color=#FFFFFFFF>prepares</color>
K53.Desc: Some Skills cannot be used directly. Instead, they need to be <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color> over a certain number of turns.\nWhen it is a certain player's turn, and this player's active character is currently <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill, this player's turn will be skipped. If the Skill has finished being <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepared</color>, the character will directly use that Skill at this time. (Skills that require <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> cannot activate effects triggered by "using a Skill" or "triggering an Elemental Reaction" or other such effects.)\nOnly active characters can <color=#FFFFFFFF>prepare</color> Skills, and if an active character who is <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparing</color> a Skill gets switched off-field, their <color=#FFFFFFFF>preparation</color> will be interrupted.

C112072.Name: Prayer of the Crimson Crown
C112072.Desc:
Your characters' <color=#FFFFFFFF>Normal Attacks</color> deal +1 DMG.
Your Sword, Claymore, and Polearm-wielding characters' $[K100] is converted to $[K102].
<color=#FFFFFFFF>After you switch characters</color>, you deal 1 $[K102]. (Once per Round)

<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>.

K100.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2100}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Physical DMG</color>
K100.Desc: Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.

K102.Name: {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>
K102.Desc:
Applies {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}Hydro and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2103}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Vaporize</color>: DMG +2 for this instance
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2104}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Electro-Charged</color>ï¼šDMG +1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2101}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Frozen</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives +2 Physical or Pyro DMG)
{SPRITE_PRESET#2102}{SPRITE_PRESET#2107}<color=#FFFFFFFF>Bloom</color>: DMG +1 for this instance, creates a [<color=#FFFFFFFF>Dendro Core</color>] that grants +2 DMG to the next instance of Pyro or Electro DMG

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
